Question.Subject: Username for xanga help?
Question.Content:
Im making a new xanga and i need help trying to find a username Name:Nikki (real name Sarah) Interests:Fashion, makeup, tennis, writing I want something lik cool and edgy
ps im starting a fashion/beauty blog
Question.ChosenAnswer:
SaharaBeauty or just Sahara.
Its something creative and exotic. Have you ever heard of the Sahara desert? It beautiful, just like how makeup can make one feel beautiful, HAHA. Your name is in it too in a way:)

Answer.Content:
